videos.title: Blender Product Design, Part 1: Modeling
videos.description:
Let's do some 3D Modeling, Rendering, and Animation in Blender 4.0! In this first video, we will go through a full modeling workflow. Product design and advertising is very accessible in Blender, and later in the series we will texture and animate the full product!

#blender #blender3d #3danimation #design #cgi 

Follow along and feel free to ask any questions! For more free content, feel free to check out my other work:

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Nickel3D
Instagram: www.instagram.com/nickel_3d
Also check out my website: www.nickel3d.com

Happy Blendering! : )

videos.title: Blender Product Design, Part 2: Shading
videos.description:
This video is part two of the Blender Product Design and Animation Series, and we will be covering the full shading process in Blender 4.0!

All the files you need (including the textures and 3D model) can be downloaded for free at my Patreon, link is below. Comment any questions and I will do my best to support!

#blender #blender3d #3danimation #design #cgi 

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Nickel3D
Instagram: www.instagram.com/nickel_3d
Also check out my website: www.nickel3d.com

Happy Blendering! : )

videos.title: Blender Product Design Tutorial: Part 3, Animation and Rendering
videos.description:
Let's create a product visualization, animation, and render in Blender! Download the starting project file for free from my Patreon linked below.

In this Part 3 video in the product design series, we will make an Apple-esque render of the classic OP-1 from Teenage Engineering. Happy Blendering!! : )

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Nickel3D
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nickel_3d

#blender3d #blender #productvisualization #3d #3danimation

videos.title: Product Design in Blender, Part 2: Texturing
videos.description:
Time for the next Blender product design tutorial! We will cover the shading and texturing of the 3D model we made in Part 1, you can download the file to start with me from my Patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/Nickel3D

#blender3d #tutorial #blender #design #cgi #b3d #render

videos.title: Product Design in Blender, Part 3: Animation and Lighting Tutorial
videos.description:
In this video we will do the final lighting, scene setup, and animation of our product design in Blender!! The starting scene file can be found for free on my Patreon, hope you enjoy!!

https://www.patreon.com/Nickel3D


#blender3d #tutorial #blender #productvisualization #productdesign #3danimation #cgi #howto #figma

videos.title: Blender Product Design Tutorial, Part 1: Modeling
videos.description:
In this video, we will do some product design and modeling in Blender! Later on we will focus on the textures, lighting, and animation! I hope you enjoy the tutorial, you can find the reference images linked on my Patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/Nickel3D
https://www.instagram.com/nickel_3d
